private AtomicInteger counter;
ScheduledExecutorService timer = Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor();
timer.scheduleAtFixedRate(new Runnable(){
    @Override
    public void run() {
        counter.set(0);
    }
}, 0, 1, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
